• Free returns
  • Most orders are delivered within 7 business days from the purchase date. Shipping questions?
  • Does not ship to PO boxes/AK/HI/Canada/Puerto Rico

deals.highlightsHtml: These soft men’s shorts are great for lounging, working out, and playing sports
deals.pitchHtml:
Men’s Marled and Solid French Terry Shorts

  • Soft cotton blend
  • Marled and solid designs
  • Contrast and solid trims
  • Slim fit
  • Elasticized waistband with a drawstring
  • 2 side pockets with a zipper closure
  • 1 back pocket
  • Double-stitched hem
  • Materials: 60% cotton, 40% polyester
  • Machine wash warm with like colors (gentle cycle)
  • Tumble dry low and do not bleach
  • Sizing chart

For post-purchase inquiries, please contact customer support.

Sold by Groupon Goods. View the products FAQ to learn more.

deals.highlightsHtml: Slim-cut men’s suits in classic colors are ideal for job interviews, formal occasions, or weddings
deals.pitchHtml:
Braveman Slim Fit Suit with Free Tie

  • Men’s slim-fit suits includes jacket and trousers
  • Includes free tie, chosen at random
  • Single-breasted
  • 100% polyester
  • Dry clean only
  • Sizing chart
What to Know When You're Buying a Suit

Buying a suit requires you to consider everything from choice of materials to cut to your own measurements. Nail a style you'll like with this walkthrough.
How to Take Your Own Suit Measurements

We break down taking your essential suit measurements into simple steps so that you can quickly order shirts, suits, and pants online whenever you like.

For post-purchase inquiries, please contact customer support.

Sold by Groupon Goods. View the FAQ to learn more.

deals.highlightsHtml: Both comfortable and stylish, these loafers pair well with khakis, shorts, or jeans
deals.pitchHtml:
Solo Fred Men’s Slip-On or Lace-Up Comfort Loafers

  • Lace-up or slip-on design
  • Comfortable, lightweight construction
  • Uppers made from 100% synthetic leather
  • Outsole material: compressed TPR
  • Fits true to size
  • Medium width

For post-purchase inquiries, please contact customer support.

View the Goods FAQ to learn more.

deals.announcementTitle: Braveman Men's Slim-Fit Solid 2-Piece Suit with Free Tie
deals.finePrint:

deals.highlightsHtml: This 2-piece slim-fit suit comes with a free tie and is great to wear for a job interview, wedding, or other formal occasions
deals.pitchHtml:
Braveman Men’s Slim-Fit Solid 2-Piece Suit with Free Tie

  • 2-piece solid suit
  • Slim-fit design
  • Coat and unhemmed trousers
  • Free tie included
  • Material: 100% polyester
  • Dry clean only
  • Men’s sizing chart
What to Know When You're Buying a Suit

Buying a suit requires you to consider everything from choice of materials to cut to your own measurements. Nail a style you'll like with this walkthrough.
How to Take Your Own Suit Measurements

We break down taking your essential suit measurements into simple steps so that you can quickly order shirts, suits, and pants online whenever you like.

For post-purchase inquiries, please contact customer support.

Sold by Groupon Goods. View the products FAQ to learn more.

deals.highlightsHtml: Classic double-vented men’s suit is a suitable outfit for business meetings or other important events
deals.pitchHtml:
Braveman Men’s Classic Fit Suits with Pair of Socks

  • Classic fit men’s suit
  • Single-breasted suit features a coat and trousers
  • Double-vented design
  • Material: polyester
  • Pair of dress socks included
  • Suggested care instructions
  • Sizing chart
What to Know When You're Buying a Suit

Buying a suit requires you to consider everything from choice of materials to cut to your own measurements. Nail a style you'll like with this walkthrough.
How to Take Your Own Suit Measurements

We break down taking your essential suit measurements into simple steps so that you can quickly order shirts, suits, and pants online whenever you like.

For post-purchase inquiries, please contact customer support.

View the Goods FAQ to learn more.

deals.announcementTitle: Braveman Men's 2-Piece Slim-Fit Suit with Tie
deals.finePrint:
• Free returns
  • Does not ship to PO boxes/AK/HI/Canada/Puerto Rico.
  • Most orders are delivered within 7 business days from the purchase date. Shipping questions?

deals.highlightsHtml: Designed for formal occasions, this versatile, slim-fit suit comes with minimal pants and a classic single-breasted jacket
deals.pitchHtml:
Set Contents

  • Jacket
  • Trousers
  • Tie

Braveman Men’s 2-Piece Slim-Fit Suit with Tie

  • Classic, slim-fit suit great for formal events
  • Single-breasted jacket
  • Peaked lapels
  • Minimal, unhemmed, straight-leg trousers
  • Trouser pockets
  • Material: 100% polyester
  • Care instructions: dry clean only
  • Sizing information
What to Know When You're Buying a Suit

Buying a suit requires you to consider everything from choice of materials to cut to your own measurements. Nail a style you'll like with this walkthrough.
How to Take Your Own Suit Measurements

We break down taking your essential suit measurements into simple steps so that you can quickly order shirts, suits, and pants online whenever you like.

For post-purchase inquiries, please contact customer support.

View the Goods FAQ to learn more.

deals.highlightsHtml: Pair this formal coat and unhemmed trousers with a white shirt and dress lace-up shoes for a black-tie look
deals.pitchHtml:
Braveman Men’s Slim-Fit Suit (2-Piece)

  • Formal dress and office outfit idea
  • Can be worn all year round
  • Plain design goes well with almost any shirt, tie, or shoes
  • Materials: 80% polyester, 20% viscose
  • Care instructions: dry clean only
  • Sizing chart

In the box: a coat and unhemmed trousers

What to Know When You're Buying a Suit

Buying a suit requires you to consider everything from choice of materials to cut to your own measurements. Nail a style you'll like with this walkthrough.
How to Take Your Own Suit Measurements

We break down taking your essential suit measurements into simple steps so that you can quickly order shirts, suits, and pants online whenever you like.

For post-purchase inquiries, please contact customer support.

Sold by Groupon Goods. View the FAQ to learn more.

deals.finePrint:

deals.highlightsHtml: Solid color pattern gives off a classic style that looks great as formal attire; multiple pockets are great for carrying daily essentials
deals.pitchHtml:
Set Contents

  • 1 jacket
  • 1 pair of trousers
  • 1 pair of socks

Braveman Classic Fit 2-Piece Suit with Dress Socks

  • Single-breasted, double-vented jacket
  • 2 front trouser pockets
  • 1 jacket hanky pocket
  • Solid color pattern
  • Classic fit
  • Made of 100% polyester
  • Dry clean only
  • Sizing chart
What to Know When You're Buying a Suit

Buying a suit requires you to consider everything from choice of materials to cut to your own measurements. Nail a style you'll like with this walkthrough.
How to Take Your Own Suit Measurements

We break down taking your essential suit measurements into simple steps so that you can quickly order shirts, suits, and pants online whenever you like.

For post-purchase inquiries, please contact customer support.

Sold by Groupon Goods. View the FAQ to learn more.

deals.highlightsHtml: Tuxedot set includes a coat with a shawl lapel, unhemmed trousers, and a bow tie
deals.pitchHtml:
Braveman Men’s Shawl-Lapel Runway Tuxedo with Bow Tie

  • Set includes a coat, trousers, and a bow tie
  • Satin-covered shawl lapel
  • 1-button closure
  • Unhemmed trousers
  • Material: 100% polyester
  • Care instructions: dry clean only
  • Sizing chart
What to Know When You're Buying a Suit

Buying a suit requires you to consider everything from choice of materials to cut to your own measurements. Nail a style you'll like with this walkthrough.
How to Take Your Own Suit Measurements

We break down taking your essential suit measurements into simple steps so that you can quickly order shirts, suits, and pants online whenever you like.

For post-purchase inquiries, please contact customer support.

View the Goods FAQ to learn more.

deals.highlightsHtml: Constructed to help keep you warm while staying comfortable, these men’s slim fit fleece pants are ideal wearing while casually lounging
deals.pitchHtml:
Click here for more jogger styles.

Galaxy By Harvic Men’s Slim Fit Fleece Jogger Pants

  • Men’s slim fit jogger pants
  • Heavyweight fleece helps keep you warm
  • Elastic waistband stretches to fit
  • Outer drawstring can be adjusted
  • Ribbed detailing at the cuffs and waistband
  • Materials: 100% polyester
  • Machine wash cold
  • Men’s sizing chart

For post-purchase inquiries, please contact customer support.

deals.highlightsHtml: Keep your cash, credit cards, IDs or passport safe and organized in this sleek wallet or passport holder made of genuine leather
deals.pitchHtml:
Options

  • Bifold Wallet
  • Trifold Wallet
  • Passport Holder
  • Coat Wallet

Genuine Leather Bifold, Trifold, or Coat Wallet or Passport Holder

Bifold Wallet
  • 2 divided bill sections
  • 8 card slots
  • 2 ID windows
  • Made of genuine leather
  • Stitched by hand
  • Product dimensions: 4.25” (W) x 3.25” (L) x 1” (D)
Trifold Wallet
  • 2 divided bill sections
  • 10 card slots
  • One ID window
  • Made of genuine leather
  • Stitched by hand
  • Product dimensions: 4” (W) x 3.5” (L) x 1” (D)
Passport Holder
  • Slip in your passport to keep it protected
  • Extra slot on the front
  • Made of genuine leather
  • Stitched by hand
  • Product dimensions: 5.5” (W) x 4” (L) x 0.25” (D)
Coat Wallet
  • 19 card slots
  • ID window
  • 2 long slots to hold paper bills
  • Made of genuine leather
  • Stitched by hand
  • Product dimensions: 7 (W) x 4.25 (L) x 0.75” (D)

For post-purchase inquiries, please contact customer support.

deals.highlightsHtml: Fashion suit for semi-formal or casual wear that adds a bit of diversity to a man’s wardrobe
deals.pitchHtml:
Braveman Men’s Slim-Fit Suit with Free Tie

  • Slim-fit 2-piece suit
  • Single-breasted jacket
  • Unhemmed trousers
  • Materials: 100% polyester
  • Sizing chart
  • Dry clean only
What to Know When You're Buying a Suit

Buying a suit requires you to consider everything from choice of materials to cut to your own measurements. Nail a style you'll like with this walkthrough.
How to Take Your Own Suit Measurements

We break down taking your essential suit measurements into simple steps so that you can quickly order shirts, suits, and pants online whenever you like.

For post-purchase inquiries, please contact customer support.

Sold by Groupon Goods. View the FAQ to learn more.

deals.highlightsHtml: These soft and comfortable ribbed tanks with double stitched hem detailing are ideal for layering underneath sweaters, tees or dress shirts
deals.pitchHtml:
Men’s Ribbed Tank Tops (12-Pack)

  • Men’s classic fit under-shirts
  • Tagless for extra comfort
  • Double stitched hem
  • Ribbed trim at the neckline and armholes
  • Shrinkage control maintains shape
  • Made with a breathable material
  • Materials: 60% cotton, 40% polyester
  • Machine wash cold, tumble dry low
  • Men’s sizing chart

For post-purchase inquiries, please contact customer support.

Sold by Groupon Goods. View the FAQ to learn more.

deals.highlightsHtml: Two piece slim fit suit from Uomo by Braveman featuring 100% polyester coat and unhemmed trousers
deals.pitchHtml:
MDRN Uomo by Braveman Men’s Slim Fit Suit (2-Piece)

  • Single breasted slim fit
  • Includes: coat and unhemmed trousers
  • Product material: 100% polyester
  • Care instructions: dry clean only
  • Sizing chart
What to Know When You're Buying a Suit

Buying a suit requires you to consider everything from choice of materials to cut to your own measurements. Nail a style you'll like with this walkthrough.
How to Take Your Own Suit Measurements

We break down taking your essential suit measurements into simple steps so that you can quickly order shirts, suits, and pants online whenever you like.

For post-purchase inquiries, please contact customer support.

View the Goods FAQ to learn more.

deals.highlightsHtml: These men’s fashion sneakers with a 1” heel height and perforated faux leather construction are breathable, making them ideal for hot days
deals.pitchHtml:
Solo Men’s Lace-Up Perforated Fashion Sneakers

  • Men’s perforated fashion sneakers
  • Lace-up closure
  • Material: Faux leather suede
  • Fits true to size
  • Dimensions:
    • Heel height: 1”
    • Back counter height from heel to top counter: 3.8”
    • Circumference 10.7”
    • Width: 4”

For post-purchase inquiries, please contact customer support.

deals.highlightsHtml: This men’s polo shirt is made with moisture-wicking Syntrel fabric with a jacquard stripe design and is ideal for casual wear
deals.pitchHtml:
Zorrel Men’s Syntrel Jacquard-Striped Polos

  • Men’s polo shirt with ribbed knit collar
  • Tonal jacquard stripe design
  • Moisture-wicking Syntrel fabric
  • 3-button placket
  • Open-hemmed sleeves
  • Double-needle top stitching
  • Material: 175 GSM polyester
  • Suggested care instructions
  • Men’s sizing chart

For post-purchase inquiries, please contact customer support.

Sold by Groupon Goods. View the products FAQ to learn more.

deals.pitchHtml:
Men’s Short-Sleeve Polo Shirts (5-Pack)

  • Includes 5 men’s polo T-shirts
  • 2-button placket
  • Semi-fitted design
  • Short sleeves
  • Ribbed armbands and s polo collar

  • Tumble dry low, warm iron
  • Sizing chart
  • Sizing runs small; it is recommended to purchase a size up

For post-purchase inquiries, please contact customer support.

deals.highlightsHtml: Lightweight compression shirt slims and shapes abdomen while preserving body heat to aid in weight loss
deals.pitchHtml:
Hot Shapers Men’s Compression Slimming Shirt

  • Designed to compress and shape abdomen
  • Slims and tightens midsection
  • Absorbs sweat to keep wearer dry
  • Lightweight, stretchy fabric fits closely and comfortably
  • Preserves body heat to stimulate sweating and aid in weight loss
  • Can be worn with workout wear or everyday clothes
  • Materials: neoprene 55%, polyester 22.5%, nylon 22.5%
  • Care instructions: Hand wash at 30°C, do not tumble dry, do not iron, do not bleach, do not wring. Do not dry clean or line dry, hang dry only.
  • Size chart

For post-purchase inquiries, please contact customer support.

Sold by Groupon Goods. View the FAQ to learn more.

deals.highlightsHtml: A randomly selected 30-pack of socks pulled from the Goods vault of treasures
deals.pitchHtml:
Men’s Dress Socks (30 Pairs) Mystery Deal

  • Randomly selected 30-pack of dress socks
  • Dozens of likely possibilities such as striped and checked socks
  • Limited number of high-value items also possible
  • Materials: 85% acrylic, 10% nylon, 5% spandex
  • Machine-wash, do not bleach
  • One size fits shoe sizes 6–12.5

Goods Mystery Deal

Humans have long been fascinated with uncertainty. Ancient man rolled knucklebones in place of dice to decide where to hunt or who would get the big horn for their helmet. Archaeologists found loaded die in the ruins of Pompeii, where both winners and losers were trumped by a volcano. According to Greek mythology, Zeus, Poseidon, and Hades cast lots to divide the universe. This deal lets you join these adventurous souls throughout history—cheering at the thrill of the unknown.

For post-purchase inquiries, please contact customer support.

Sold by Groupon Goods. View the products FAQ to learn more.

• Free returns
  • Most orders are delivered within 7 business days from the purchase date. Shipping questions?
  • Does not ship to PO boxes/AK/HI/Puerto Rico
  • How is the strike-through price determined?
deals.highlightsHtml: Pair these cargo shorts with a plain tee and low-top sneakers to create a relaxed look great for a tailgate party, barbecue, or outdoor game
deals.pitchHtml:
Men’s Belted Cotton Cargo Shorts

  • Buy one size up for a generous fit
  • Distressed cargo pants
  • Zip fly and button closure
  • Belt loops and a tonal D-ring belt
  • Slit pockets at the front and flap pockets at the back
  • Side button-flap cargo pockets
  • Drawstring at the hem
  • Material: 100% cotton
  • Machine-wash cold, non-chlorine bleach when needed, tumble-dry normal, low-heat iron, do not dry clean
  • For sizes 44-48, see here
  • Sizing chart

For post-purchase inquiries, please contact customer support.

Sold by Groupon Goods. View the products FAQ to learn more.

deals.title: Men's Belted Distressed Cargo Utility Shorts
deals.announcementTitle: Men's Belted Distressed Cargo Utility Shorts
deals.finePrint:
• Free returns
  • Does not ship to PO boxes/AK/HI/Puerto Rico.
  • Most orders are delivered within 7 business days from the purchase date. Shipping questions?
  • How is the strike-through price determined?
deals.highlightsHtml: These comfort-fit cotton twill shorts with a distressed look feature multiple functional pockets and can be great for hot summer days
deals.pitchHtml:
Men’s Belted Distressed Cargo Utility Shorts

  • Men’s comfort-fit shorts with a distressed washed vintage look
  • Front slit pockets, button-flap pockets on sides, flap pockets on back
  • Zip fly and button closure
  • Belt loops and tonal D-ring belt
  • Drawstring at hem
  • Lands below the knee
  • Cargo pocket button details may vary
  • Made with a soft and durable cotton twill
  • Machine wash cold, tumble dry normal, do not dry clean, non-chlorine bleach when needed, low heat iron
  • Sizing chart:
Size 30 32 34 36 38 40 42
Waist 31.5'' 33.5'' 35.5'' 37.5'' 39.5'' 41.5'' 43.5''
Length (from crotch down) 10'' 10.5'' 10.5'' 11'' 11.5'' 11.5'' 12"

For post-purchase inquiries, please contact customer support. 

View the Goods FAQ to learn more.

Wine Bottle Umbrella

  • Compact carrying case in a wine bottle shape
  • Umbrella’s panel corresponds to the bottle design

deals.highlightsHtml: These chelsea boots with pull loop and elastic side panels work well with both office attire and casual outfit
deals.pitchHtml:
Gino Pheroni Men’s Calvin Chelsea Boots

  • Men’s chelsea boots
  • Feature pull-loop and alastic side panels for added comfort
  • Come with flexible outsole for traction
  • Slip-on style
  • Plain toe
  • Pair well with slacks or jeans
  • Boot height: ankle high
  • Width: medium
  • Materials:
    • Upper: faux-suede leather
    • Lining: PU
    • Outsole: rubber
  • Suggested care instructions
  • Fit true to size

For post-purchase inquiries, please contact customer support.

Sold by Groupon Goods. View the products FAQ to learn more.

deals.highlightsHtml: Wing-tip, single monk-strap, slip-on shoes featuring leather lining for added comfort and durability are a great addition to formal outfits
deals.pitchHtml:
Signature Men’s Single Monk-Strap Wing-Tip Shoes

  • Wing-tip, single monk-strap dress shoes
  • Slip-on design
  • Manmade upper
  • Rubber sole
  • Leather lining for comfort and durability
  • Medium width
  • Fit true to size

For post-purchase inquiries, please contact customer support.

Sold by Groupon Goods. View the FAQ to learn more.
